statements: SELECT * FROM historical_claims;
SELECT claim_id, member_id, claim_date FROM historical_claims WHERE member_id = 100;
SELECT diagnosis_code, procedure_code, billed_amount, paid_amount FROM historical_claims WHERE claim_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM historical_claims ORDER BY member_id ASC, claim_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(billed_amount) AS avg_billed_amount, AVG(paid_amount) AS avg_paid_amount FROM historical_claims;
SELECT * FROM historical_claims ORDER BY claim_date DESC, paid_amount ASC
SELECT member_id, diagnosis_code, billed_amount FROM historical_claims WHERE member_id = 123 AND billed_amount > 1000
SELECT claim_id, diagnosis_code, procedure_code, billed_amount, paid_amount FROM historical_claims WHERE diagnosis_code LIKE 'A%' AND paid_amount < 500
SELECT * FROM historical_claims WHERE procedure_code IN ('P001', 'P002', 'P003') ORDER BY claim_date ASC
SELECT member_id, SUM(billed_amount) AS total_billed_amount FROM historical_claims GROUP BY member_id HAVING SUM(billed_amount) > 5000 ORDER BY total_billed_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM claims_data LIMIT 10;
SELECT claim_id, member_id, amount FROM claims_data WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT member_id, gender, zip_code FROM member_data WHERE gender = 'FEMALE';
SELECT claim_date, amount FROM claims_data ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM member_data WHERE zip_code = '12345';
SELECT * FROM claims_data WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY claim_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT claim_id, member_id FROM claims_data WHERE claim_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT member_id, gender FROM member_data WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01' ORDER BY member_id ASC;
SELECT claim_id, amount FROM claims_data WHERE amount < 500 ORDER BY claim_date ASC, amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM claims_data WHERE amount > 2000 AND claim_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY amount DESC, claim_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Claims ORDER BY claim_id DESC;
SELECT claim_id, diagnosis_code FROM Claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT member_name, member_gender FROM Members WHERE member_dob BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '1999-12-31';
SELECT provider_name FROM Providers WHERE provider_specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT claim_id, service_date FROM Claims WHERE member_id = 12345;
SELECT c.*, m.member_name, m.member_gender FROM Claims c JOIN Members m ON c.member_id = m.member_id;
SELECT p.provider_name, p.provider_specialty, COUNT(c.claim_id) AS total_claims FROM Providers p LEFT JOIN Claims c ON p.provider_id = c.provider_id GROUP BY p.provider_id;
SELECT c.*, m.member_name, p.provider_name FROM Claims c JOIN Members m ON c.member_id = m.member_id JOIN Providers p ON c.provider_id = p.provider_id WHERE c.claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT m.member_name, COUNT(c.claim_id) AS total_claims FROM Members m LEFT JOIN Claims c ON m.member_id = c.member_id GROUP BY m.member_id HAVING total_claims > 5;

SELECT c.claim_id, c.diagnosis_code, c.claim_amount, c.service_date, m.member_name, p.provider_name FROM Claims c JOIN Members m ON c.member_id = m.member_id JOIN Providers p ON c.provider_id = p.provider_id ORDER BY c.service_date DESC, c.claim_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM claims;
SELECT patient_id, claim_date FROM claims WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT claim_id, patient_id, claim_date, amount FROM claims ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, insurance_provider FROM patients WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 50;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM providers WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM claims WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY claim_date DESC
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patients WHERE age >= 65
SELECT provider_name, specialty, city FROM providers WHERE city = 'New York'
SELECT claim_id, claim_date FROM claims WHERE patient_id = 3
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT * FROM claims;
SELECT member_id, claim_amount FROM claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT provider_name, provider_specialty FROM providers ORDER BY provider_specialty DESC;
SELECT * FROM members WHERE member_dob BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '1990-12-31';
SELECT diagnosis_code, diagnosis_description FROM diagnoses WHERE diagnosis_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000 ORDER BY claim_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT provider_name, provider_specialty, provider_location FROM providers WHERE provider_specialty = 'Cardiology' ORDER BY provider_name;
SELECT member_name, member_address FROM members WHERE member_dob < '1980-01-01';
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, claim_date FROM claims WHERE claim_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT provider_name, provider_location FROM providers WHERE provider_location LIKE '%New York%' ORDER BY provider_name;
